description.en: "My heart is so painful, why doesn't he love me? Why did he have to torture my little heart like this?" What kind of man would let a gentle woman issue such as a complaint, is the moral loss or the lack of human nature? The man said, "I am not too overbearing, but too handsome and too rich." A president, a flat woman, through the cracks in the dimension to rub the spark! Cold and elegant, wild and hot!
